articles.description: ‘I can’t believe I’m firmly in the “ The Gray Man is good, actually” camp’
articles.content:
Netflix viewers are taking to Twitter to say actually The Gray Man is good despite what critics think.
The Russo Brothers new film was released on Netflix on Friday (22 July).

articles.author: Andrew Webster
articles.title: John Wick 4's first trailer questions when it all ends - The Verge
articles.description: At San Diego Comic-Con 2022 fans got a first glimpse at John Wick 4 in a new trailer, which stars Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Donnie Yen, and Bill Skarsgård. It’s coming to theaters in March 2023.

articles.title: Johnny Depp follows Amber Heard in filing appeal over defamation trial - The Guardian
articles.description: Depp’s lawyers submit documents a day after Heard challenged outcome of multimillion-dollar case
articles.content:
Johnny Depp has filed a notice of appeal one day after his former partner Amber Heard filed her own against the outcome of a multimillion-dollar defamation case.

articles.title: West End: First new large-scale theatre in 50 years to open - BBC
articles.description: Situated above Tottenham Court Road station the theatre is part of a £300m regeneration project.
